mapper.delete: delete from zy_article_tag at where at.article_id = #{articleId} AND at.tag_id = #{tagId}
mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type IN ('C', 'F') AND m.status = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0
